title: ForTube BSC版本流动性激励调整提案： ForTube BSC Version Liquidity Incentivized Adjustment Plan
body:
目前，FOR在ForTube BSC版本 每日流动性激励释放数量为20万，根据早期社区提出逐步减少流动性激励的意见反馈，新一轮的流动性激励参数设置提案如下，现请社区对以下方案进行投票。
At present, the number of daily liquidity incentives released in the ForTube BSC version is 200,000 FOR. According to the feedback from the community in the early stage to gradually reduce the liquidity incentives, the new round of liquidity incentive parameters are set as follows. We are inviting the community to vote for the following plans:
 
A方案：继续进行ForTube在 BSC链上的流动性激励活动 ，奖励降低到每天10万FOR。
Plan A: Continue with ForTube's liquidity incentive activities on BSC, and reduce the reward to 100,000 FOR per day.
 
B方案：继续进行ForTube在 BSC链上的流动性激励活动 ，奖励降低到每天5万 FOR。
Plan B: Continue with ForTube's liquidity incentive activities on BSC, areduce the reward to 50,000 FOR per day.
 
投票时间：2021年1月15日18:30——1月16日 18:30
Voting time: January 15, 2021 6:30 PM - January 16, 2021 6:30 PM
author: 0xED1E2B03928C17dC1782d846CbC48659f3a31bE4
